definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: phrases, above, upwards (Ph. [[מעל]], v. sub [[מַ֫טּה]] p. 641: abbrev. from [[מַעֲלֶה]]; cf. [[מַ֫עַן]] in [[לְמַ֫עַן]] from [[עָנׇה]]: Kö:ii. 116):—†

definitions.title: 1 c
definitions.body: ), on the top of, above, Ge 22:9 [[ממעל לָעֵחִים]] above the wood, Ex 28:27 = Ex 39:20, Le 11:21 [[כְּרָעַיִם מִמַּעַל לְרַגְלָיו]], Is 6:2 [[שְׁרָפִים עׂמדים מִמַּעַל לוֹ]], Is 14:13, Je 43:10, Ez Eze 1:26, Da 12:6, Da 12:7; = on higher ground than, Je 35:4; fig. Je 52:32 (‖ 2Ki 25:28 [[מֵעַל]]).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: fig. De 28:43 [[יַעֲלֶה עֶלֶיךָ מַ֫עְלָה]] [[מָ֫עְלָה]] upwards, upwards, i.e. higher and higher (opp. [[מַ֫טָּה מָֽטָה]]). †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[וׇמַ֫עְלָה]] (a) of direction in space, Ju Jdg 1:36 [[מֵהַסֶּלַע וׇמַ֫עְלָה]] from the rock and upwards (cf. Bu), 1Ki 7:31 (corrupt: v. Sta VB Benz), 1Sa 9:2 = 1Sa 10:23 [[מִשִּׁכְמוֹ וׇמַ֫עְלָה]] from his shoulder and upwards: so ´[[וּלְמ]], † Ez Eze 1:27 [[מִמַּרְאֵה]] [[מָתְנׇיו וּלְמָָעְלָה]] Eze 8:2, Eze 43:5. (b) of direction in time, or age:—(a) [[מִבֶּן עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנׇה וׇמָָעְלָה]] Ex 30:14, Nu 1:3 + 19 t. P, ´[[מִבֶּן חׂדֶשׁ חׂדֶשׁ וׇמ]] Nu 3:15, Nu 3:22 + 6 t. P, simil. Nu 4:3, Nu 8:24 + 7 t. P; elsewhere only 1Ch 23:3, 1Ch 23:24, Ezr 3:8, and with [[וּלְמַעְלָה]] † 1Ch 23:17, 2Ch 31:16, 2Ch 31:17; ´[[וׇמ]] …[[לְמִבֶּן ]] † 2Ch 25:5; and 2Ki 3:21 [[מִכּׂל חׂגֵר חֲגׁרָה]] ´[[וׇמ]]. † (b) ´[[מהיום ההוא וׇמ]] from that day and onwards, 1Sa 16:13, 1Sa 30:25. † (g) ´[[מן היום הזִה וׇמ]] from this day and upwards (i.e. and back), Hag 2:15, Hag 2:18. †
